summary: This module provides basic arithmetic operations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Returns the sum of a and b.

methods.name: subtract
methods.description: Returns the difference between a and b.

methods.name: multiply
methods.description: Returns the product of a and b.

methods.name: divide
methods.description: Returns the quotient of a and b. Raises a ValueError if b is zero.
